articles.content: The 2022 Oscars ceremony is coming up on March 27, and 10 new movies are up for the Best Picture title: Belfast, CODA, Dont Look Up, Drive My Car, Dune, King Richard, Licorice Pizza, Nightmare Alley,… [+4457 chars]

articles.title: 'Dog' co-director Reid Carolin reveals the real-life happy endings for his canine stars - EW.com
articles.description: Channing Tatum directs and stars in his first buddy comedy with a canine co-lead. Co-director Reid Carolin goes off-leash to chat about the process.
